Title: Donald the Normal
Writer: Ray McKinnon (created by), Kate Powers, Ray McKinnon, Chad Feehan (executive story editor), Coleman Herbert (executive story editor), Scott Teems (story editor)
Actors: Aden Young, Abigail Spencer, J. Smith-Cameron, Adelaide Clemens
Plot: A recovered Daniel explores Atlanta and enjoys a taste of big-city anonymity, while Amantha starts packing up her apartment. Tawney grows frustrated with Ted, Jr.'s ever-shifting moods, ...
